# MKGeoJSONDecoder

**Class**

An object that decodes GeoJSON objects into MapKit types.

## Declaration

```swift
class MKGeoJSONDecoder
```

## Overview

The GeoJSON decoder returns objects that conform to the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKGeoJSONObject] protocol.

## Decoding GeoJSON objects

- **decode(_:)**: Decodes the provided data into native MapKit types that a map can display.

## Geographical features

- **Displaying an Indoor Map**: Use the Indoor Mapping Data Format (IMDF) to show an indoor map with custom overlays and points of interest.
- **MKGeoJSONFeature**: The decoded representation of a GeoJSON feature.
- **MKGeoJSONObject**: Objects that the GeoJSON decoder can return.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
